description.value:
This golden cape, embroidered with vibrant red sun rays, sparkles like sunlight reflecting off the ocean.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Effect The cape glows with the effects of 1st-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light]. You can Activate the cape again to Dismiss the effect.

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You draw the cape and unleash a blinding flash of light. All enemies within 30 feet that can see you must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round and dazzled for 1 minute. The creature can spend an Interact action rubbing its eyes to end the blinded condition.

Critical Failure The creature is blinded for 1 round and dazzled for 1 hour.
